body.name: Thermalright ASF-Black AM5 CPU Holder, Corrective Anti-Bending Fixing Frame, AM5 Full-fit Fixed Non-Marking Mounter, AM5 Anti-Bending Contact Frame, CPU Cooler Standard
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 14 hrs 17 mins
features: 【Dedicated CPU slot】Exclusive AM5 anti-bending corrector with all-aluminum anodized sandblasting process, Fully laminated, non-marking installation with even pressure edges, multiple installations will not wear out the CPU cover..
【Insulated foot pad】Precise positioning of AM5 CPU slot size with insulated protective feet can reduce the capacitance caused by thermal conductive silicone contacting the CPU.

【Antioxidant effect】All aluminum alloy precision workmanship, surface oxidation treatment, rounded perimeter, not easy to scratch, carefully designed to fit the CPU perfectly, can support the weight of the cooler to prevent the CPU from being bent, black version.

【Easy to installation】Suitable for AM5 CPU motherboard slots, configured with L-shaped screwdriver for easy installation. The included TF7 2g silicone grease with a thermal conductivity of 12.8W/M.K can be combined with a cooler to quickly enhance the CPU cooling effect. Follow the instructions or installation video to operate, you can install successfully in one step.
【Support Specifications】Product size: 70 (L) × 54 (W) × 6 (H) mm, only supports AMD: AM5 CPU, motherboard slot for AM5, chipset for X670, B650 series, weight: body: 20g, overall 55g.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install aesthetically pleasing.
reviews.reviewText: Very high quality part. Hard to say if it’s functionally any better than the standard mounting. Looks great, easy to install, good price, and keeps thermal paste out of the chip on AM5 systems. Gamers nexus on YouTube has a review of this companies product installed on an intel system if you want to see thermals and installation tips.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Not sure if I needed this or if it makes any temp difference because it is in a new system with nothing to compare it to, but It was easy to install, looks good, (even though you can't see it after assembly) and there is no way the cpu is going to move. I simply installed the cpu in the factory socket, then removed the 4 screws that attach the factory mechanism and lifted it straight up and out. Then installed the new fixing frame with the provided screws and wrench. Perfect fit and easy to work with.In other reviews, someone questioned that the frame did not go all the way to the top of the CPU. That's okay, it is not supposed to. If it did, your cooler would not make adequate contact with the CPU.One note, if you are removing the plastic clamping hold downs on your motherboard to install different cooler brackets or a water block, leave them in place and install this first. It will hold the back place once you remove the plastic brackets, making life easier.So, I don't know if it helps with the AM5 socket, but it's not that expensive in the grand scheme and is a quality part. Can't hurt and I like it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Defiantly better than the stock bracket
reviews.reviewText: no hard installation ,no insane bending of the stock brackets

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Can't say too much about a simple part like this, other than it does exactly what it's designed to do. With this properly installed, there is pretty much no possible way to torque down a cooler on the CPU in a way that would create significantly more pressure on one side of the CPU compared to the other. This virtually guarantees your cooler will be seated perfectly and work as well as it possibly can (so long as you properly apply any thermal paste you might be using). This won't, in and of itself, increase cooling, but it will help ensure your cooler is mounted properly so that it can work effectively.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Installation requires removal of motherboard from the PC case
reviews.reviewText: I'm a little surprised by the number of reviewers claiming that installation was "easy" given that the backplate falls off the back of the motherboard once you remove the CPU ILM.It wasn't immediately obvious to me as to why the screws where failing to thread into the motherboard until I found a comment on one of their installation videos which pointed out that the backplate had likely fallen out onto the back of the case which required that I disassemble the entire PC, and remove the motherboard just to install this CPU frame.Performance wise It had very little if any impact on CPU temperatures.I would say that the only upside to this product is cleaner application of thermal paste especially given the design of the new AM5 processors.The build also looks a bit cleaner with the CPU frame so there's that as well although you likely won't notice if you're using a air cooler which sits on top of it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great, dropped 10C.
reviews.reviewText: Does its job of dropping CPU temps and keeping the thermal paste from getting into the oddly designed CPU lid. Highly recommend. I love the splash of red, but it also comes in black.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install, works with AIO liquid cooler.
reviews.reviewText: Fit perfectly, and sat a little bit below the processor in height. I think this is important, because you want your cooling solution to be touching CPU, not be partially touching this frame and possibly not seating correctly.I didn't try to compare temps with this installed vs not, but my temps with a 7800x3d and a DeepCool 720 (360mm) installed are idle around 50C, max load under 75C.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than the OEM bracket
reviews.reviewText: Easy to install and works better than the OEM fastener that feels like you're going to bend or break something when securing it.
No se puede pedir mas, esta placa es necesaria.
It increases the cooling rate of CPU meaning CPU can operate higher clock at full load

With the AMD cpu been so solid this wont be needed to stop any "bend" unlike the intel but with the notches it will stop your thermal paste going everywhere....if you can get it at a good price it makes everything look more solid and you wonder why with the price of these motherboards why wasn't this something they had already
